entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
